function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Psychological reservations affecting destination choices","Impact":"Risk of choosing destinations with higher health risk and potential for infection","Mitigation":"Education on health risks and disease transmission, promotion of safe and low-risk destinations","Technologies":"Health education campaigns, promotion of low-risk destinations","People":"Travelers","Owner":"Health organizations, travel agencies"},{"Description":"Increased risk perception leading to modification of destination preferences","Impact":"Potential reduction in the probability of disease transmission, impact on tourism industry","Mitigation":"Promotion of safe travel practices and destinations, development of health and safety guidelines for tourism","Technologies":"Health and safety guidelines, travel advisory systems","People":"Tourists, travel industry","Owner":"Tourism organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Tendency to travel with socially close companions and avoid strangers","Impact":"Potential negative impact on social interactions during travel, reduced openness to strangers","Mitigation":"Promotion of safe travel behavior, development of guidelines for social interactions during travel","Technologies":"Social interaction guidelines, travel behavior promotion","People":"Travelers","Owner":"Travel agencies, social organizations"}]}
